targets.query: SELECT mean(*) FROM "logs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "kernel" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "netstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean(*) FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /$host/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
